marklogic.body: No Obama didn't set his package.Â Think it would have been much lower if he had?Â YOU make me Vomit hypocrite.Â Scream loud and long that the GOP is the party of the 'rich', the party of the 1%....well HEREs a rich democrat for you.Â A 1%er who is a DEMOCRAT.Â Love seeing you left wing demoguges made liars out of.Â Like the GOP is controlled by the ultra-right (like you dumos AREN'T controlled by the ultra-left?).Â Well, here they are making liars out of you again by nominating a moderate.Â Appears the GOP not only has the right but has the center as well.Â Come November YOUR worship is going down in flames.Â Demos are jumping Off left and right because they don't want to Burn with him.Â He'll make Peanut Carter look like a winner.Â But to you, it's just a partisan game.Â 'Hurray for our side'.Â Pitiful.
